title.en: A shift begins. I'm already done.
title.es: Sat down. Knew it wouldn't last.
title.pt-BR: My food's getting cold, but who cares?

comment.en: I often wonder if any creature feels as perpetually under-caffeinated as I do.
comment.es: ¿Habrá quien viva con esta falta de café constante?
comment.pt-BR: Será que só eu vivo meio descafeinado assim?

title.en: Food's cold. At least I'm used to it.
title.es: My food's cold. Just like my soul.

comment.en: It's humbling how some creatures avoid my daily paperwork and still manage to thrive.
comment.pt-BR: Ah, os bichos sem papelada, prosperam. Eu, aqui.

title.en: My break just started. What did I forget?

comment.en: Such incredible adaptations, and I'm still figuring out how to survive another Monday.
comment.es: Qué adaptaciones, y yo cómo pasar otro lunes.
comment.pt-BR: Que adaptações... E eu penando na segunda.

title.es: Shift started. My soul just clocked out.
title.pt-BR: This food is cold. What did I expect?

comment.en: Their annual travels make my morning commute feel surprisingly ambitious.
comment.es: Sus viajes hacen mi trayecto parecer ambicioso.
comment.pt-BR: Ah, as viagens... Meu trajeto vira saga.
